datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to ocean ecosystems, marine creatures, and conservation efforts.

columns.name: seasonal_current_variation
columns.description: Categorical rating of the seasonal variation in ocean currents near the reef

columns.name: daily_sunlight_hours
columns.description: Average number of hours of sunlight received per day at the location

columns.name: pollution_level
columns.description: Categorized level of pollution near the reef, based on toxins and chemical measurements

columns.name: fishing_activity
columns.description: Level of human fishing activity near the reef, categorized as low, medium, high

columns.name: cloud_cover
columns.description: Percentage of the sky covered by clouds at the location, which can block sunlight

columns.name: coral_species_count
columns.description: Number of different coral species present

columns.name: water_clarity
columns.description: Clarity of the water at the marine location, based on turbidity and particulate matter, measured in NTU (Nephelometric Turbidity Units)

columns.name: ocean_depth
columns.description: Depth of the ocean at the reef location, measured in meters

columns.name: marine_predator_density
columns.description: The estimated number of large marine predators per square kilometer in the surrounding water

columns.name: sea_surface_temperature
columns.description: Average sea surface temperature near the reef, measured in degrees Celsius

columns.name: shipping_route_presence
columns.description: Indicates whether there is a major shipping route within 50 kilometers of the reef

columns.name: salinity_variation
columns.description: Yearly variation in salinity measured by the difference between maximum and minimum salinity levels in the area

columns.name: reef_location
columns.description: Generalized location of the coral reef

columns.name: human_activity_score
columns.description: Score representing the level of human activity near the reef, based on factors such as fishing, boating, and pollution

columns.name: reef_proximity_to_land
columns.description: Proximity of the reef to the nearest landmass, measured in kilometers

columns.name: water_temperature
columns.description: Average water temperature near the coral reef in Celsius

columns.name: bleaching_resistance
columns.description: Whether the coral reef resisted a bleaching event, 1 for resisted, 0 for not resisted

columns.name: reef_is_protected
columns.description: Binary indicator of whether the reef is in a legally protected conservation area

queries.question: Is there a relationship between bleaching resistance in coral reefs and daily sunlight hours when pollution level is low and seasonal current rate is low?
queries.true_hypothesis: In marine ecosystems, when both the pollution level is 'low' and the seasonal current rate is 'low', then the combined influence of sea surface temperature, reef proximity to land, reef activities, fishing activity, and daily sunlight hours determines that bleaching resistance is likely when the coral reef has more than 100 species of coral.
